description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Swain</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus three times.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Draw a Swain.
Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus three times.
flavorText: When the Ionian locals saw it looming on the horizon, they thought it a monster. They were not far from the truth--the steel warship is terrifying, the greatest feat of Noxian naval engineering yet.
name: The Leviathan
